name: Road Trip the Game
description:
Road Trip the Game
A game where you try to drive as far as possible without running out of gas or fuel. As you go you can collect coins. These coins can be used in the shop.

Shop Upgrades:
Durability - Increases the number of times you can crash
Max Fuel-Increases fuel
Fuel Efficiency - Decreases the speed that fuel decreases at
Coin Multiplier - Multiplies coins earned

Controls:
A/D to switch lanes

Notes:
My first time making audio for a game so the audio may not be great.
All assets were made by me.
